fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.javamail.thundermbox

Class ThunderMboxStore

  • Object
    • javax.mail.Service
      • javax.mail.Store
        • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.javamail.thundermbox.ThunderMboxStore

  • public class ThunderMboxStore
extends javax.mail.Store
    JavaMail Store for Thunderbird mbox directory/file structure.

    Warning:Only for reading and without file locking or new messages management.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThunderMboxStore

        public ThunderMboxStore(javax.mail.Session session,
                        javax.mail.URLName url)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        url - the url formed as protocol://user@host/container
        • user is the user (declarative only, not mandatory and not used in processing)
        • host for now only localhost
        • container is the directory where is the thunderbird mbox hierarchy (default current directory)
          • ex: /home/me/.thunderbird/hag0y625.default/ImapMail/localhost
